channel.title: See through platebody, shield doesnt move, boots, gloves, help!
channel.description: Okay so I added vestas statius promethium and primal to my server, and everything works great except for the platebodies.. they look ok until you move.. when you move the sleeves of the armor don't move and you can see the characters shirt through the armor, same glitch with all the platebodies. Does it have to do with animations? Are the ints wrong? I'm using a pi client so I have itemdef not class8. Also equipping the gloves I added makes the characters arms disappear. And the boots are glitchy. Like when you run the boots just stretch instead of moving with the feet... I'm not stupid I'm just still learning the ropes of rsps development. Please help! I have teamviewer and msn!

item.title: See through platebody, shield doesnt move, boots, gloves, help!
item.dc:creator: @whitefox125 whitefox125
item.description:
@whitefox125 wrote:

I’m not at my computer right now but what ints and models are actually good models for Vesta prom and primal then? Because I used the models and ints posted on mopar forums by blade owner or something like that

Read full topic
